description_html: Keep it objective: no first or second person.
story_html:
Make it personal (first and second person ok), preferably with a beginning, middle, and end.

To keep up to date, follow this site on social media or subscribe to the Artsy Visions Monthly Newsletter!
affiliate_ad_html:
Get the Book/DVD!

There is a review of the series-title on ArtsyVisions.com. We highly recommend watching the book/series/movie!

Clicking on the affiliate link in the button below and making a purchase helps to support this site, at no additional cost to you.

image_list.title: Donald Trump
image_list.subtitle_html: 45th President of the USA — Jan. 21, 2017 to present
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in this spiritual portrait of represents Trump's emotional side.  In Extraverts, the dominant function is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this.  Trump demonstrates this trait when he gets angry with his detractors.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Trump's preference for pragmatism over idealism.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary function is directed inwardly and is less evident than the dominant function.  Trump demonstrates this trait in his willingness to sacrifice environmental concerns for the possibility of creating jobs.
image_list.story_intro_html: At the time of this writing, everyone I know is marveling at — or dreading — the daily reports of what ....
image_list.story_html:
At the time of this writing, everyone I know is marveling at — or dreading — the daily reports of what the Trump administration is doing.

This story is — at this time — still unfolding, so I am holding off on writing this story until we have a new president, because until then, this administration may still have some tricks up its sleeve.

image_list.title: Mike Pence
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Mike Pence's spiritual portrait shows he is ______________.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Mike Pence's dominant personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the logical/rational/objective over the emotional/personal/subjective.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Mike Pence's auxiliary personality trait, iNtuition: idealism and hope for the future; openness to new ideas; very slight/moderate/strong preference for ideas over facts.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....

image_list.title: Nancy Pelosi
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Nancy Pelosi's spiritual portrait shows she is ______________.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Nancy Pelosi's dominant personality trait, iNtuition: idealism and hope for the future; openness to new ideas; very slight/moderate/strong preference for ideas over facts.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_dom_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference/tendency is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.explain_aux: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Nancy Pelosi's auxiliary personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more logical/rational/objective over the emotional/personal/subjective.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....

In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this. In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.
